title: Tools
description: Handheld and powered tools used in a makerspace.

children.description: Manual tools for assembly, shaping, cutting, and fastening.

children.description: Flat, Phillips, Torx and specialty screwdrivers.

children.description: Needle-nose, combination, locking, and cutting pliers.

children.description: Adjustable and fixed wrenches, socket sets.

children.description: Cordless drills, impact drivers, hammer drills.

children.title: Sanders & Grinders
children.description: Orbital sanders, belt sanders, angle grinders.

children.title: Measuring & Layout
children.description: Tools for measuring, marking, and alignment.

children.title: Calipers
children.description: Digital and analog calipers and gauges.

children.title: Squares & Levels
children.description: Try squares, combination squares, spirit levels.

children.title: Tape Measures
children.description: Tape measures, rulers, and measuring tapes.

title: Electronics
description: Electronic components and electronics work equipment.

children.description: Components that do not amplify or generate signals.

children.description: Active components including ICs and semiconductors.

children.title: Logic ICs
children.description: Common logic families and interface ICs.

children.title: Tools & Measurement
children.description: Equipment used for electronics assembly and debugging.

children.title: Soldering Stations
children.description: Soldering irons, stations, tips, and holders.

title: Digital Fabrication
description: Machines and supplies for digital manufacturing.

children.title: Laser Cutting
children.description: Laser cutters, engraving, and associated tooling.

children.description: CO2 and fiber laser cutter machines.

children.title: CNC Routers
children.description: CNC routers for wood and composites.

children.title: CNC Mills
children.description: CNC mills for metal and plastics.
